# LLMs.txt - AI Crawler Guidance

## About This Site
This is a test site demonstrating complete site infrastructure.

## Purpose
Educational resource for web development best practices.

## Contact
For questions, contact: webmaster@example.com

## Allowed Uses
- Indexing for search
- Training data (with attribution)
- Content summarization

## Restrictions
- No impersonation
- Respect robots.txt directives
